thread.title: Rutha Gates
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Rutha Gates

author: Rutha Gates
title: Rutha Gates
text: Before I knew about Optima tax I didn't know what to do or where to turn I was scared that everything I own was going to be taken away from me but Optima Tax save my life and put me back on the right track now I don't have to worry about the I.R.S.they settle my case got me a lower payment and I am so happy that Optima Tax was able to help me I would recommend every body who needs help with the I.R.S. to give them a try they are truly a blessing.
